title: Ticket #6641: condor_q -hold should not truncate the hold reason
description:
In the 8.4 series, condor_q -hold would not truncate the hold reason to fit the width of the display. In effect -hold implied -wide. When condor_q was re-written for 8.6 to support -batch mode, this feature was accidently deleted.

It should be restored, so that -hold will automatically imply -wide.
